name: Siddhi Men Fat Burner Herbal Tea Bags
description: Siddhi is an all natural herbal tea made with a blend of ayurvedic herbs. It is specially formulated for men to promote burning of unwanted fat deposits in the body thereby aiding in weight loss naturally. Senna in the formula is a mild laxative which improves digestion. Moringa is a super food that boosts energy and strength. Nelli purifies blood and thereby promotes healthy skin. This formula relieves stress and improves quality of sleep as well. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
